reviewText: I heard Dr. Jobe Martin, the biologist who explains these fascinating creatures, speak sometime in the last 10 years, and more recently came across this set (though the set was probably available when I heard him speak).  If you are a solid believer in God, or if you aren't, this set is equally valuable for all people who are open to the idea.I will use just three examples here of why this set is so fascinating.  1) The Pacific golden plover knows, without demonstration, how to fly 88 hours from the Arctic to Hawaii.  It has to be accurate and not mess up by even a degree, or it will die.  Thus this skill couldn't evolve by trial and error, because it has to be gotten right the first time!  2) The mussel's means of reproduction is for its larvae to imitate a fish's bait, so that the larvae will be snatched by the fish and grow within it for several weeks.  This also had to be gotten right the first time, instead of learned over time by trial and error and gradual stages of evolution, or the mussel would be extinct.  3) The main creature that knows how to pollinate the vanilla orchid is the Melipona bee, and the vanilla orchid is only open for 2 1/2 to 3 hours before wilting.  The Melipona bee pollinates the vanilla orchid so the vanilla bean can grow.  The vanilla orchid needs the Melipona bee to survive.  According to the beginning of Genesis in the Bible, all life was originally created in short succession, not millions of years.  These two life forms (the vanilla orchid and Melipona bee) were made for each other, Jobe Martin argues.Dr. Jobe Martin uses several principles in this series to refute evolution.  (Note to skeptics:  He was trained to be an evolutionist and studied biology and dentistry with that in mind.  His journey away from evolutionary thinking was gradual and the result of being convinced by evidence.)  Among these principles are:1) Survival has to be gotten right the first time, in many cases.  Evolution by trial and error or slow mutations could never produce success under that kind of pressure.2) Genetic material is never gained, always lost.  Therefore we know from genetic science that evolution to higher forms is not possible.  There are over 700 varieties of dogs because genetic information has been narrowed/lost.3) Where are the missing links/transitional forms between species?  Why are new creatures not showing up?  Why would we have to worry about endangered species if new creatures were constantly emerging by evolution?4) The interdependence of the earth's ecosystem (for example, photosynthesis - plants need animals, and animals and people need plants), and of the components/processes within an individual creature, demands that all the components be there at once.  Gradual evolution doesn't work.5) How could impersonal forces create intelligence by accident?  Chemicals are not ideas/intelligence.6) Explosions (the Big Bang) create chaos, not order!7) Evolution is speculative philosophy/metaphysical naturalism, and cannot be determined by forensic science (fossils) or operational science (reproducible, experimentally verifiable laboratory work).  Evolution is not science.  It is a way science/data is interpreted.This series is one of the few things I would say is a MUST see.  I can't recommend it strongly enough.
summary: Fantastic!!  For anyone with an open mind, I can't recommend it strongly enough

reviewText: I didn't buy these on DVD, but my wife and I watched them all on Netflix. They really made me think about how amazing the creatures on this planet are and how amazing our God really is. To me it takes WAY more faith to believe in evolution than it does creationism. When you step back and look at the amazing complexities and how they are all intertwined and work together harmonically you can't help but realize that there has to be a God and this all could not have just happened from some primordial soup or some big bang. It's statistically impossible. I don't care how long of time it may have supposedly taken.For the evolutionists, where did the particles come from the big bang? Where did the first atom come from that makes up any kind of particle, and to take it a step further, to think that this whole complex eco system that we live on called Earth along with the entire order of the universe all evolved from 1 small atom molecule that suddenly decided to explode and make new atoms. You can't take absolutely nothing, no matter or particles or anything and then suddenly have something unless it was created. Believing in evolution is absurd. Our God is an awesome God.
summary: HOLY HOLY HOLY LORD GOD ALMIGHTY!

reviewText: Let me be concise and simple:1.) Evolution is a SPECULATION! It canNOT be repeated in the lab. Evolution exists only in the "text"books. Nowhere else. Well it also exist on the drawings of some theologically inclined dogmatic naturalists, whose theology is atheism. Nevertheless, evolution is FAR from being a fact!!!2.) All the videos in this series are spinning around the idea of "Irreducible Complexity". This is an idea(far more attractive than the evolution), that many organism are irreducibly complex.Irreducibly complex is a type of complexity that cannot be reduced any further. For example, for  me to use computer to type this message, I at least needs the following: processor, motherboard, input (keyboard), and internet connection. If any of the following is absent I cannot write here on Amazon.com.So, for some (if not all, but let's speculate for second) organisms to operate many components are needed at the (a) SAME time and (b) FULLY operational.a) if they are operational but not present at the same time, organism will not be functional. I twill simply die. "Dead organisms (as being said in the video) cannot evolve!"b) if they are all present but not functional, organism will also die. and again, "dead organisms cannot evolve".In addition to being (a) present at the same time and (b) be fully operational, the specific components of the particular organism are unique. Unique parts of the organism are specifically built for the specific purpose.There are plenty of various examples of the INTELLIGENCE imprinted in organisms that cannot and should not be there if evolution is true.For example: giraffes, woodpeckers, are irreducibly complex.Birds who migrate have a knowledge when and why to migrate, etc.There are plenty of examples for those who willing to take of wishful pink glasses of dogmatic naturalism, set them aside and be honest.Great videos.

reviewText: "Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution" is a three volume DVD boxed set that showcases animals featuring sophisticated and complex designs that are not explained by traditional evolutionary theory. These are animals who provide examples of what creationists have termed the 'irreducible complexity' of life challenging the concept of classic evolutionary development. "Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution" is the result of Dr. Jobe Martin's twenty years of research and study. Dr. Martin was a traditional evolutionist whose medical and scientific training compelled him to challenge the commonly held assumptions underlying evolutionary development theory based upon his independent researches. "Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution" is a welcome contribution to the on-going scientific debate concerning the issues of creationism, intelligent design, and the theory of evolution.
summary: a welcome contribution to the on-going scientific debate

reviewText: In the first sentence of the video the narrator distinguishes birds and fishes from animals as if birds and fishes were not two kinds of animals.  Before long we see and hear an enormous red-facing gaffe about the placement of valves in a giraffe's neck when the dentist expert claims that these valves are in the arteries but of course they are in the veins as one would expect and as the technical literature reports them.  A high school fact-checker could have corrected these and the many other credibility-crushing mistakes if the two adults had only asked for such help.  Those two errors of fact occur in just the first few minutes of a several hour production.  Perhaps I will post a sample of the other mistakes as I see and hear them.  These are errors of fact that one can look up and check in the biology literature whether one is an evolutionist or a creationist instead.Here's something else both funny and sad.  The dentist narrator seems to have something like o.c. disorder or Tourette's syndrome with a desire to get many things backwards.  Not only does he say arteries have valves when it's the giraffe's veins that have valves (I have the relevant journal articles before me), he says evolutionists believe life is 3.5 billion years old and that they believe the first cells are thought to have appeared 600 million years ago, but in fact the textbooks, including the one I use in my own university classes, give the CELLS as 3.5 billion years old and by 600 million years ago the cells of all the diverse kingdoms of life had long since appeared.  This, like the other points mentioned above, is another "giraffe gaffe" demonstrating the incompetence of this poor misguided soul.  At least he could look things up before he opens his mouth for the camera.  And as for his main message, as Bertrand Russell once said - "A grown man should learn to live without the comfort of fairy tales."In the second DVD we learn early on that there are plants, insects, and animals as if insects are not animals.  Then the dentist tells us that about every 12 feet or so of additional sea-water depth causes another atmosphere of pressure increase.  Try about 33 feet instead.  This individual is winging it, shooting from the hip, and just hoping it will somehow come out all right.  Which it doesn't.  Again the animals are "he" the same way a slug or ant is a "he" to a child who squats on his or her haunches and asks what "he" is as IT crawls or runs along.
summary: demonstrably incompetent in just the first several minutes

reviewText: As usual, the "Creationist" hacks are busy displaying their total contempt for truth and their lack of comprehension of the concept of Evolution.  They have spent the last century or so manufacturing, counterfeiting, and misinterpreting evidence in a vain and frantic effort to prove that the last 4 billion-odd years of Earth's history never happened.  This video set is dedicated to the ludicrous proposition that the existence of unusual animals somehow "proves" that evolution doesn't happen.  It even has the temerity to ignore the most unusual animal on the planet (and one of the best documented in terms of its evolution), homo sapiens.A fundamental problem with the one-sided confrontation between heavyweight Evolution and featherweight "Creationism" is that the difference between the fact of evolution and the theory of Evolution is almost never mentioned.  The fact of evolution is that over the very long history of the planet old species have vanished and new species have arisen regularly.  This fact was known even before Erasmus Darwin (Charles Darwin's grandfather) coined the term "evolution".  Charles, one of the greatest naturalists of his time, after extensive research, published the simple and elegant theory that bears his name.  This theory is among the best evidence we have that god doesn't speak only to religious nuts.  Of course, the original theory has by now been considerably elaborated (punctuated equilibrium and all that), a fact that the "Creationist" flacks are happy to overlook in their trembling eagerness to discredit Darwinism.The centerpiece of this latest fit of antiscientific pique is the misrepresentation of the bombardier beetle.  This rather noxious bug exists in some 500-odd species divided between 4 genera which use different mechanisms to deliver their chemical blasts.  This variation is one of the surest signs of evolutionary development.  The claim of "Creationism" is that the bombardier's chemical defense is too complex to have evolved spontaneously (instead of having been designed by some deity with an advanced degree from MIT).  The underlying principle of this bogus claim has never been proved - and, in fact, chaos theory supports the probability of spontaneous development of complex systems.  In the case of the bombardier, possible evolutionary routes have been worked out - and in the absence of detailed fossil evidence that is an effective riposte.  As it happens, close relatives of the bombardiers show rudimentary versions of the bombardier's chemical mechanism ... another sure indication of evolutionary development.  Another sure sign that the "Creationists" haven't the foggiest notion what they're talking about is the fact that they frequently misrepresent how the bombardier's chemicals actually work (for instance, that they combine explosively outside the beetle's body, whereas they do so inside - hence the explosive spray).The rest of the material on these discs tends to be a little more matter-of-fact in terms of interesting (but hardly impossible) characteristics of giraffes, whales, migratory birds, and whatnot.  The photography is colorful and there is a good deal of interesting information.  Unfortunately, all this is accompanied by the insistent cant about complex characteristics that can't evolve on their own.  This is a mere notion, unscientific, undemonstrated, unproven, and untrue.  Once the ludicrous nature of this assertion is realized, the entire antiscientific structure of these videos collapses.  They succeed only when they preach to (a) the choir and (b) the ignorant.Evolution is one of the best documented facts about life on Earth.  So, for that matter, is the age of the Earth - a fact the Creationists generally love to deny for no good reason.  Those who believe the "intelligent design" wrinkle has validity would do well to read Stephen Jay Gould's essay, "The Panda's Thumb".  The panda's "thumb" is necessary to deal with its exclusive diet, bamboo.  It's an evolutionary afterthought, having developed from a spur of bone in the wrist (an evolution documented by fossil ancestors of the panda).  Any "design" half-way "intelligent" would have given the panda a thumb in the first place.Nor is evolution a theory based only on fossils.  In historic times, a flock of starlings (if I recall the type of bird correctly) that isolated itself in an abandoned railway tunnel developed into a new species in about a century.  Another documented and historic development is the evolution of a new species from the British Lesser Black-Backed Gull during a circumpolar migration that created interbreeding subspecies until the British Herring Gull, which could interbreed westward along the migration route but not with the original gull to its east.The present DVD set, far from telling anyone anything true or useful about evolution is merely an exercise in intellectual dishonesty with pretty pictures.  For pretty pictures, try National Geographic.  For evolution, try Darwin and Gould.  As for this ... well, did you ever know a false dogma that didn't make use of pretty pictures?

reviewText: Here's the deal:  I'm a scientifically trained (medical doctor) Christian.  I have always believed "Creation--definitely; Evolution--probably."  I have never quite understood why most people think these two theories MUST be mutually exclusive.  The blossoming of the "Intelligent Design" theory within the scientific community is a vindication of my view, held since grade school, that creationism and evolutionism don't HAVE to conflict.In other words while I believe the THEORY of Evolution best fits the available facts,(it IS still a theory, BTW) I have always believed that IF evolution is true, then God controlled it. In other words, I believe that "Evolution" is simply man's attempt to put into words, a methodical description of the process by which God developed His creation.I had expected to enjoy this DVD.  That being said, I was very dissatisfied with it.  Although the alleged scientist whose story this is PURPORTS to have been an evolutionist, he surely does not speak as one who was ever well-versed in the science of evolution.  The way he presents the animals and describes the "impossibility" of their evolution betrays a deep LACK of understanding about how evolution is theorized to work.This work added little to my Faith and nothing to my understanding of science.  I give it the second star, because I did enjoy watching the descriptions of the animals presented.  Whether developed by the process of evolution or not, the glory and beauty of God's creation is unmistakeable!
summary: Misapprehension of the science gets in his way.

reviewText: My goodness, the attacks on this DVD set that I see here!  Folks, in case you don't knowalready, understanding evolution isn't just for the elite scientifically trained.  Look at Darwin, hewasn't even a scientist himself!  I saw this set in the library at a Church.The most memorable example of irreducible complexity for me was the butterfly.I did not know that at one time in the cocoon the transfiguring caterpillar is in a liquid state.I couldn't even imagine, much less articulate, how many kinds and types of trial and error Darwinianchange that little caterpillar would have to go through to become a beautifulbutterfly - while at the same time surviving and passing on itsgenetic information.  The whole theory of evolution is seen as what is, laughable.  That's what Darwinism is,the funniest - and saddest - bunch of pseudo science that has ever been foistedoff on the unsuspecting public.  But if people would prefer to believe they are accidental,insignicant, incredibly short- lived by-products of some primal pond, should we burst theirmuddy little bubbles and try to convince them that Someone Almighty loves themdearly and wants to give them a future and a hope?  Hmmmm.  ;-)
summary: If the evolutionists hate it that much.... did it hit a nerve?? ;-)
